What do we learn?

  • HTML (HyperText Markup Language) - easy

  • CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) - not hard

  • JS (JavaScript) - not very hard

Icebreaker on JS

  • Using js code to introduce yourself

  • Fork this pen upon request. Don't do that too early.

  • Requirements:

    • Each student take turns asking everyone else in the breakout room to answer some student generated question
    • Think of a question that leads to a data type, such as a String, Number, Boolean, Array, or Object answer.
    • Save the group info in one code pen file and send it back to the group chat.

  • Results:

    • to be replaced by javascript
